comments.raw_text:
Quoting https://wiki.mozilla.org/Services/Roadmaps/Sync/Client:

  Avoid synchronous I/O *everywhere*. Needs async bulk APIs in platform:

    forms
    passwords
    bookmarks

I can't find any bugs for these, so... let's file them!

I expect (and hope) that the scope of these desired changes will balloon into API improvements (not just async + bulk), observer cleanups, storage changes...
